MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the PA4 postcode area of Renfrew. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10pm to carry out repairs on our Underground cable network on Cockels Loan and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:40pm on Tuesday 20th April 2021
